content: today was a snowy day, i was very happy to see the snowflakes

visualPrompt.visualPrompt: Swirling snowflakes dancing in the air, illuminated by a warm golden glow from an unseen light source. The flakes sparkle and drift lazily, creating a sense of tranquil wonder and enchantment.
visualPrompt.colorPalette: Soft whites, pale blues, and muted golds
visualPrompt.cinematicStyle: Slow, floating camera movement to match the drifting snowflakes
